articles.title: Embittered Republicans plot to knock off House GOP’s hard-right leader in primary feud | CNN Politics
articles.description: CNN’s Manu Raju takes a look at Rep. Bob Good (R-VA) and why some Republicans plot to knock off the House GOP’s hard-right leader in the Virginia primary feud.

articles.title: Video appears to show GOP Congressman suggesting dropping bombs on Gaza | CNN Politics
articles.description: In a video posted online by a person affiliated with a Democratic advocacy group, Republican Rep. Tim Walberg can be heard, but not seen, appearing to suggest bombs should be dropped on Gaza “like Nagasaki and Hiroshima” to “get it over quick.” Walberg insist…

articles.title: Congresswoman Nita Lowey: I am proud to stand with Israel
